params.subnetId: : the destination subnet for the funds.
params.to: : the address to which to credit funds in the destination subnet.

register(uint256).details: The subnet can optionally pass a genesis circulating supply that would be pre-allocated in the subnet from genesis (without having to wait for the subnet to be spawned to propagate the funds).

params.to: : the address to which to credit funds in the parent subnet.

releaseStake(uint256).details: it can be used to release the stake or reward of the validator

addStake().notice: addStake - add collateral for an existing subnet

fund((uint64,address[]),(uint8,bytes)).notice: fund() credits the received value to the specified address in the specified child subnet. There may be an associated fee that gets distributed to validators in the subnet. Currently this fee is zero, i.e. funding a subnet is free.

kill().notice: kill an existing subnet. It's balance must be empty

register(uint256).notice: register a subnet in the gateway. It is called by a subnet when it reaches the threshold stake

release((uint8,bytes)).notice: release() burns the received value locally in subnet and commits a bottom-up message to release the assets in the parent.         The local supply of a subnet is always the native coin, so this method doesn't have to deal with tokens.

releaseStake(uint256).notice: release amount for an existing subnetrelease collateral for an existing subnet

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Subnet does not allow child subnets"

value.value: Subnet does not allow child subnets

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct SubnetID memory,address) pure returns (struct SubnetID memory)
function (struct SubnetID memory) view returns (bool,struct Subnet storage pointer)
function (address) view returns (bool,struct Subnet storage pointer)

documentation.text: @notice addStake - add collateral for an existing subnet

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address) view returns (bool,struct Subnet storage pointer)
function (address) view returns (bool,struct Subnet storage pointer)
function (address) view returns (bool,struct Subnet storage pointer)

documentation.text: @notice kill an existing subnet. It's balance must be empty

function () view external returns (struct SupplySource memory)
function (struct SubnetID memory,address,struct FvmAddress memory,uint256,uint256) pure returns (struct CrossMsg memory)
function () view external returns (struct SupplySource memory)
function (struct SubnetID memory,address,struct FvmAddress memory,uint256,uint256) pure returns (struct CrossMsg memory)
